EmailTemplate.name: 17.CEM.CustExMgt.none.D.N.G.13612.CDP Pay as you Go.Auto-Responds
EmailTemplate.subject: Your complementary report from Nokia has arrived
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}} {{lead.Last Name:default=edit me}},
Thank you for your interest in Nokia Pay as you go IoT device management. Here is your complementary report, Agility and flexibility will drive CSPs’ adoption of SaaS-based customer care systems.
Find out how Nokia can help you jump-start your IoT business. Read the brochure <[[https://resources.nokia.com/asset/201261]]>
Best Regards
The Nokia IoT Device Management Team Download the Report <[[https://resources.nokia.com/asset/201364]]> © 2017 Nokia.
